he Veiled Tears was an infamous enchanted greatsword of elven make.
The Veiled Tears was created sometime before 1372 DR by an elven master smith named Quilin. Subsequently, the powerful enchanted sword gained a negative reputation. With time, a lesser cousin of the Veiled Tears was created by one of Quilins apprentices for mistress Lissial‎. That sword was originally named the Gentle Rain‎.
